MATCH MEAL OFFER

1. Promotion Details, Concept and Participation

1.1.    Connaught Plaza Restaurants Private Limited (“Organizer”), is licensed to operate McDonald’s Restaurants  in North and East India, and currently operates such Restaurants in the States of Delhi, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Punjab, Chandigarh, Himachal Pradesh, Rajasthan, Uttarakhand, Bihar, West Bengal, Madhya Pradesh  and Jammu & Kashmir(collectively “Promotion Territories”). The Organizer will conduct a (i) Selfie contest; and (ii) a lucky draw promotion during the period commencing from October 30, 2021 to November 30, 2021 (“Promotion Period”) under the name of “Match Meal” to promote sale of  either (i) a Small Coca-Cola (or other carbonated beverage) plus a McAloo Tikki® Burger and/or (ii) a Small Coca-Cola (or other carbonated beverage) plus  a Chicken McGrill® Burger   (“Promotional Products”) within the Promotional Territories in accordance with the terms and conditions set out below (“Promotion”).

1.2.    The Promotion comprises of (i) a selfie contest (“Selfie Contest”); and (ii) a lucky draw (“Lucky Draw”), which shall be conducted in accordance with the terms and conditions mentioned below. By participating  in  this  Promotion,  the  Eligible Persons as per Clause 5 (each a “Participant”) accepts  and  agrees  to  abide  by  these  terms  and conditions of the Promotion (“Promotion Terms”).

1.3     The Promotion shall be valid for the individuals residing in the Promotional Territories and participating in such Promotion through the Restaurants operated by the Organizer in such Promotional Territories. The Promotion shall not extend to any other territory where the Organizer does not operate its Restaurants. It is further clarified that the Promotion shall not extend to the state of Tamil Nadu.

1.4.     Interested individuals being citizen(s) of India who are aged 18 years and above are eligible to participate in the Promotion by purchasing the Promotional Products. This Promotion is only limited to the Promotional Products as specified in the present Promotion.

1.5.    During the Promotion Period and subject to the terms and conditions of this Promotion, Participants will get an opportunity to attend a Meet & greet session with either Jasprit Bumrah or Mohammed Siraj (“Meet & Greet” or “Luck Draw Prize”).  A Participant is eligible to win the Lucky Draw Prize, only once and as per the Terms and Conditions of this Promotion. In addition to the chance to win the Prize, Participants will also have the chance to win certain merchandise provided by CCIPL (“Merchandise”) by participating in the Selfie Contest (based on the number of likes such Participant receives on a Selfie uploaded by such Participant after they have tagged the relevant Social Media Handles of the Organizer).

1.6.    Stocks without the Promotion offer will also be available with the Organizer. Further, certain stock of the Promotional Product containing the Promotion offer may be available before commencement of the Promotion Period or continue to be available even after the Promotion Period. However, Participants understand and agree that they will not be permitted to participate in the Promotion after the expiration or prior to start of the Promotion Period and further, agree not to raise any claim or complaint against the Organizer or its agents/authorized representatives in this respect.

1.7.    The Promotion may be advertised and promoted, inter alia, through digital media banners, print, website and other available media.

1.8.    The Promotion is subject to all applicable central, state and local laws and regulations.

1.9.    These Promotion terms and conditions (“Terms”) will be hosted at www.mcdindia.com (“Promotion Website”).

2. Organizer and Partners

2.1  This Promotion is conducted by the Organizer, having its corporate office at C/o Awfis Space Solutions, L-29 to L-34, First Floor, Connaught Place, New Delhi – 110001

2.2     Coca-Cola India Private Limited (“CCIPL”) shall be offering the Prize and the Merchandise under the Promotion.

2.3      The computerized random selection of winner for this Promotion will be conducted by an accredited firm of Chartered Accountants appointed by the Organizer (“CA”).

3. Deemed acceptance of terms and conditions

3.1     Entry and participation in this Promotion will be deemed as an unconditional and an unequivocal acceptance of these Terms, including any modifications, revisions and amendments thereto.

3.2   The decisions of Organizer, shall be final and binding on the Participants in all matters related to the Promotion.

3.3   Further, the Participants recognize that these Terms may be modified by Organizer or CCIPL from time to time without any prior/public notice by posting the applicable terms and conditions on the Promotion Website. Organizer also reserves the right to cancel or terminate the Promotion at any stage without assigning any reasons whatsoever. Successfully entering the Promotion and winning the Prize and/or Merchandise is subject to all requirements set forth herein.

4. Promotion Period

4.1 This Promotion will commence on October 30, 2021 (“Start Date”) and shall last till November 30, 2021 (“End Date”).

4.2 The Period between the Start Date and End Date shall be called the “Promotion Period”.

4.3 Participants can participate in the Promotion during the aforesaid mentioned time and be eligible to win the Lucky Draw Prize and the Merchandise in accordance with the Terms & Conditions specified herein.

4.4 Promotion will be closed for participation after the Promotion Period and Participants will not be eligible to participate in the Promotion after November 30, 2021 under any circumstances.

5. Eligibility

5.1  Subject to the criteria of Promotion Territory, entry and participation in this Promotion is open to individuals who satisfy each of the following criteria (“Eligible Persons”):

  • are of the age of 18 (eighteen) years or above.
  • possess all valid documents required for travel as necessary to enable the Winner to travel within India.
  • have not been arrested for or convicted of any crime or been the subject of any criminal investigation.
  • bear a good moral character and have not been implicated or named in any legal proceedings (either Civil or Criminal).
  • are not management, employees, directors or contractors, or the family of the management, employees, directors or contractors of Organizer, its appointed CA, their related entities or other agencies, firms or companies associated with or related to the Promotion.
  • Organizer and its affiliates, service and advertising agencies and their immediate families (spouses, parents, siblings, children and each of their spouses) and household members are not eligible to participate in the Promotion.

5.2    Please note that any application received from residents of the state of Tamil Nadu for Promotion, shall be declared as null and void and shall not be taken into consideration for the purpose of determining the Winner of the Prize.

5.3      For the sake of clarity, this Promotion is not open to Non-Resident Indians (NRIs), Overseas Citizens of India (OCIs) and Persons of Indian Origin (PIOs).

5.4   If any Eligible Person has listed his/her phone numbers on the National Do Not Call Registry (“NDNC Registry”), he/she shall de-register from the NDNC Registry prior to participating in the Promotion, till the completion of the Promotion (including availing of the Prize (if applicable) under the Promotion). Such persons agree not to make any claim or raise any complaint whatsoever against the Organizer or CCIPL in this respect. Please note that persons intending to participate in the Promotion who have not de-registered themselves from the NDNC Registry shall also have no right to make any claim or raise any complaints against Organizer or CCIPL if they do or do not receive any call or SMS with respect to their application, participation and all other matters pertaining to the Promotion.

5.5     In order to participate in the Promotion, the Organizer may also demand Participants personal data such as, Name, Phone Number, Residency Address, and any other details that the Organizer may require as part of the Promotion. The Participant agrees that failure to provide such information may  result in the forfeiture of the Participants participation in the Promotion resulting in the Participants forfeiture of their chance to participate and win the Selfie Contest and Lucky Draw. The information provided by the Participant will deemed to be the Participant’s consent to provide such information on a voluntary basis, and shall be subject to and shall be held in accordance with the Privacy Policy of the Organizer, as available on the Promotion Website.

6. How to enter the promotion

7.1     Participants wishing to enter the Promotion may do so through the following mechanism:

LUCKY DRAW

  1. The Participant will need to download the McDonald’s Mobile Application (“App”), and select region as ‘India – North & East’;
  2. The Participant will need to redeem the Match Meal Offer on the App, and proceed to purchase the Promotional Products;
  3. The Participant will need to take a selfie with the Promotional Products and post such selfie on Instagram by tagging the following Social Media Handles – “@mcdonaldsinindia” and “@cocacolaindia” while using the hashtag “#McDonaldsCricketMania”;
  4. Upon completion of the above steps (and subject to the Important Note below), the details of the Participant will be saved by the Organizer to enable the CA to use automated random selection tools to identify the winner(s) of the Luck Draw (“Lucky Draw Winner(s)”)

IMPORTANT NOTES:

(i) Participant will need to save and retain the physical copy of the invoice showing the Purchase of the Promotional Products by redeeming the Match Meal Offer from the App, as such invoice may be required by the Organizer to verify valid participation.

(ii) The Organizer may contact the Participant on Direct Message channels to obtain Participant’s information as well as verification of such other participation details as may be required by the Organizer to verify the genuineness of the Participant’s participation in the promotion.

(iii) A Participant’s participation in the Promotion will only be considered once, even if such Participant purchases the Promotional Products on multiple occasions and follows the participation steps of the Luck Draw on multiple occasions during the Promotion Period.

SELFIE CONTEST

  4. Upon completion of the above steps (and subject to the Note below), the details of the Participant will be saved by the Organizer to enable the Organiser to identify the winner(s) of the Selfie Contest (“Selfie Contest Winner(s)”)

The name of the Lucky Draw Winner(s) shall be declared on the Promotion Website.

  1. The day on which a Participant uploads their Selfie and follows the procedure set out above in relation to the Selfie Contest will be considered as Day 1.
  2. On Day 2, the is the day following Day 1 (between 9 am to 11 am), the Organizer will collate all the Selfie Contest Participants  for Day 1 and record the ‘likes’ received by such Participant. Such Participant’s will be ranked according to the number of ‘likes’ received by their Selfie. The ranking will be from highest to lowest, with the person with the most number of ‘likes’ being designated as Rank 1.
  3. On Day 3, that is, two days following Day 1, the Organizer will contact the a maximum number of 150 Selfie Contest Participants (for that day), who have received the most ‘likes’ and will announce that they are eligible to collect the Merchandise from the Organizer or CCIPL as the case may be.
  4. A Participant will only be eligible to participate in the Selfie Contest once during the entirety of the Promotion Period.
  5. As the stock of Merchandise is limited, the Organizer may withdraw the Merchandise once the stocks are consumed. A notice to this effect will be displayed on the Promotion Website.

Note: It is advisable for Participants to follow Covid prevention protocols as identified by the Government of India, including but not limited to wearing of masks, sanitization of hands and maintaining social distance.
